articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: All international travelers should get measles vaccine, CDC says - OregonLive.com
articles.description: Americans should be vaccinated against the virus no matter where they’re going, U.S. health officials now say.
articles.content:
U.S. health officials have changed their advice to international travelers about measles, saying that Americans should be vaccinated against the virus no matter where theyre going.
